name: Terrific-micro-extensions
body:
# Readme - Terrific Micro Extensions

A collection of some extensions for [Terrific Micro](http://namics.github.io/terrific-micro/).
Use these extensions at your own risk ;-)

## Lorem Generators

### Lorem Ipsum Generator

Simple [lorem text & markup generator](https://github.com/namics/terrific-micro-extensions/blob/master/Lorem-Ipsum-Generator/README.md)

## Sprite Generators

### PHP Spriter

[png Sprite generator](https://github.com/namics/terrific-micro-extensions/blob/master/php-spriter/README.md)

## Template Engines

### Terrific Micro Twig

[Twig template rendering engine](https://github.com/namics/terrific-micro-extensions/blob/master/terrific-micro-twig/README.md)

## Deployment / Export

### Grunt Terrific Micro Exporter

[Grunt Exporter](https://github.com/namics/terrific-micro-extensions/blob/master/grunt-terrific-micro-exporter/README.md)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
